entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023
